participant_1.background:
I would love to have lunch with a well-known translator, so I can learn more about the industry and get some advice on my own career.
I like to spend time alone, pursuing my own interests.
my family gets together every saturday.
i started a new job this year , which is helping me learn more about socialization.
i am still living at home at age 30.

participant_2.background:
I dropped the dogs off at the kennel before heading to my parents' house.
I play the guitar while I wear comfortable clothes and write my stories.
unfortunately , my family lives across the country from me.
i am in a very intimate and loving relationship.
i need a wheel chair to get around.

content.text: Hello! I'm doing well, how about you?
I'm great! I have a new job this year and I'm enjoying it a lot.
That's great! I'm glad to hear that.
Thanks! What do you do for fun?
I like to write stories, play guitar, and spend time with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to write stories too.
Awesome! What kind of stories do you like to write?
I like to write fiction, mostly fantasy and romance.
Those are great genres! I love to read fantasy books.
Me too! Have you read any good ones lately?
Yes, I just finished reading "The Priory of the Orange Tree" by Samantha Shannon. It was amazing!
I've heard good things about that book! I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a really great story.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'm always looking for new books to read.
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help.
